pullRequest.title: Table Exporter:  Initial Version
pullRequest.bodyText:
Resolves #1272
Description
TableExporter Initial Version using PersistentResource.loadObjects(...)
Motivation and Context
#1272
How Has This Been Tested?
Existing Test Case pass. New Test case added.
License
I confirm that this contribution is made under an Apache 2.0 license and that I have the authority necessary to make this contribution on behalf of its copyright owner.

nodes.bodyText: IOExceptions are handled by throwing a TransactionException in Elide.  We should be consistent here.

I feel like mocking all of these objects make the tests brittle.  Also, most mocks are likely not global and should be created per test.  I would focus on mocking only the challenging objects (like the data store or something).  Everything else should use real objects.
